vulkanmod.options.advCulling.tooltip: Uze a culling algoritim dat mite improov purformans by reducin teh numbr ov non-vizibl chunk sekshuns rendrd.
vulkanmod.options.ao.subBlock.tooltip: ON (Sub-blok): Enablz smoov liting fur non full blok (xperimentul).
vulkanmod.options.entityCulling.tooltip: Enablz culling fur entiteez on not vizibl sekshuns.
vulkanmod.options.frameQueue.tooltip: Hi-yur valuze mite halp stabiliz fraymtyme but will increez inpooot lag.
vulkanmod.options.indirectDraw.tooltip: Reducez CPU ovurhed but increez GPU ovurhed. Enablin it mite halp in CPU limitd sistums.
vulkanmod.options.uniqueOpaqueLayer.tool: Uze a yunik rendur layr fur opaque terayn to improov purformans. It changiz sum distunt bloks aspekt
vulkanmod.options.fixPostEffectBug.toolt: Yoos Vanilla poast-effek instead ov VulkanMod Poast-Effek sistem. Restarting teh gaem is required to take effek!
vulkanmod.options.animations.tooltip: Makz teh animate'd teksturz to animate. Disablin dis preventz dem frum animatin an may improov purformans a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderSky.tooltip: Rendurrz teh sky. Disablin dis may improov purformans a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderFog.tooltip: Rendurrz teh fog. Disablin dis may improov purformans a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderEntityOutline.to: Renders Teh White Entity Outlinez on entiti wen affected by glowy effectz. Disabling dis may improf performans a lots and also fixes half skreen rendering with ASR.
vulkanmod.options.perRenderTypeAreaBuffe:
Reducez VRAM usage by approx 20%
May Increz/Decreas FPS: Depens on GPU arkitectur
(Can boost performans on Old Nvidia cards)
vulkanmod.options.excludeSampledUsage.to: When enabld, dis opshun optimiziz teh imaj solee fur rendurrin opshunz, enhansin effishunsee, an avoidin potenshul kompresseeon ishuz, partikularly on mowbile platformz. Howevur, it restriktz teh imaj to bein solee a rendurr target, thuz prohibitin direkt samplin in shaderz.
vulkanmod.options.swapchainImages.toolti: Setz teh numbur of Swapchain imajz. Optimized automatickally fur best purformans. Dis can be reduce'd to minimyz inpooot lag but at teh cost of decreezd FPS.
vulkanmod.options.showDeviceRAMInfo.tool: Shows ur device RAM infos on debug screen.
vulkanmod.options.deviceRAMInfoUpdateDel: Sets da numbr of sekunds when da RAM info updaets. Settin too low can affect performanz.
vulkanmod.options.showPojavInfo.tooltip: Showz Pojav Info on debugg skreen.
vulkanmod.options.showLowRAM.tooltip: Sho Warnin wen yur RAM iz low
vulkanmod.options.excludeSampledUsage.wa: WARNIN: Requires Game Restart To Take Effect and will cause bugz and crashez when spectatin an entity wit Post-effect (ex. Creeper).
vulkanmod.options.resetHighUsageRec.tool: Enablez to reset highes memori and RAM usage recordz everi 45 seconz
vulkanmod.options.presentMode.tooltip:
Present Mode:

- FIFO (VSync):
  Synchronizes frame presentation with teh display's refresh rate. Ensurez regular intervalz but may introduce stutter.

- Mailbox (FastSync):
  Maximizes frame rate and responsiveness. Providez smooth rendering but consumes more resourcez. Not supported on all devicez.
vulkanmod.options.gaussianSkyBlending.to:
Dis option uses extremely aggresive Optimisationz, so may not reproduce teh Sky 100% as accurately to vanilla.

Requires Game to Restart!
vulkanmod.options.fastLeavesFix.tooltip:
(WARNIN: EXPERIMENTUL)

Affects FPS on both Fanceh/Fast Grafix

Uzes an Alternat Renderin Mode tu restore Fast Leaves on Fast Grafix

Rekomended tu use wif *Low VRAM Mode*

Xtremeleh experimentul: May Decreas performance, even on Fanceh Grafix
vulkanmod.options.depthWrite.tooltip: EXPERIMENTAL: Disables dep writin on translucen objecs (e.g., Ice Blok). May cause visual renderin bug on translucen objecs
vulkanmod.options.forceFIFOVsync.tooltip: forces da FIFO to lock on display's Refresh Rate an also fixes delay wif huge Swapchain images.
vulkanmod.options.frustumOopts.tooltip: Optimizes teh Frustum by reducin' calls.
vulkanmod.options.cameraOopts.tooltip: Greatly optimizes teh camera performanz. May cause weird chunk delay.
